official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States Constitution does not prohibit public schools from providing time for voluntary individual religious expression and prayer.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Constitution does not prohibit public schools from providing time for voluntary religious expression and prayer.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the United States Constitution does not prohibit public schools from providing time for voluntary individual religious expression and prayer.
